executable.title: Object Train Mask
executable.description: Return expert object and not object mask.
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the TubeTK project at Kitware.

image.name: inputVolume
image.label: Input Expert Mask
image.description: Input image file containing the expert marked object.

image.name: outputVolume
image.label: Output Object Mask
image.description: Output image file containing object mask.

image.name: objectMask
image.label: Output Object Mask
image.description: The object expert mask is saved as an image in the location specified by the string "objectMask".

image.name: notObjectMask
image.label: Output Not-Object Mask
image.description: The not-object expert mask is saved as an image in the location specified by the string "notObjectMask".

double.name: gap
double.label: Gap
double.description: A double value specifying the gap between the object region marked by an expert and the not-object region.

double.name: notObjectWidth
double.label: Not Object Width
double.description: A double value specifying the width around the region marked as object by an expert, that would be regarded as not-object expert mask.
